import { Row, Col } from 'antd' import Header from '../components/Header' import axios from 'axios' import Rainbow from '../components/Rainbow' import RecentPost from '../components/RecentPost' import Category from '../components/Category' import './style.less' const Home = () => { return (
) } Home.getInitialProps = async ({ req }) => { const promise = new Promise((resolve)=>{ axios('http://127.0.0.1:7001/default/getArticleList').then( (res)=>{ console.log('远程获取数据结果:',res.data) resolve(res.data) } ) }) return await promise } export default Home
